Values.METERINGPOINT_QUEUE_NAME: <Name of Service Bus queue for receiving business requests and internal commands>
Values.METERINGPOINT_SERVICE_BUS_LISTEN_CONNECT: <Service Bus connection string with listen permissions where business requests and internal commands are received>
Values.METERINGPOINT_SERVICE_BUS_MANAGE_CONNECT: <Service Bus connection string where business requests and internal commands are received with manage permissions>
Values.INTEGRATION_EVENT_QUEUE: <Name of Service Bus queue for receiving integration/notification events>
Values.INTEGRATION_EVENT_QUEUE_CONNECTION: <Service Bus connection string where integration/notification events are received>
Values.CHARGES_DEFAULT_LINK_RESPONSE_QUEUE: <Queue name that Charges response to in request/response pattern>
